summary: TATTOO- I've wanted a lot of things in life, from Barbie dolls when I was seven to a PlayStation 4 when I was seventeen, but...
caption:
TATTOO-

I’ve wanted a lot of things in life, from Barbie dolls when I was seven to a PlayStation 4 when I was seventeen, but something I’ve wanted for a lifetime is a tattoo. I can’t remember a time where I didn’t wonder what it would be like to have one. Every time I go out in public and see people with tattoos, I always admire them, thinking ‘man, I can’t wait until I’m eighteen’- (and sometimes catch them looking at me strangely so I have to pretend to be looking at something behind them).

My eighteenth birthday rolled around and I knew this year was the year. My boyfriend, Jarrod, and I got tattoos done together a few weeks ago.

I came to the conclusion that I wasn’t nervous because this was something I’ve always wanted. Unlike everything else, I had zero doubts. Not one. I knew I wanted this tattoo for the rest of my life.

Everyone told me nasty stories about tattoos and infection and how they’re really painful. It didn’t hurt at all. It felt like a burning sensation but I wouldn’t go as far as saying it hurt.

I’m already planning my next one!


-Emily

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: alternative responses to 'i love you'
title: alternative responses to 'i love you'
body:
hermione: thanks
ron: *laughs nervously*
neville: i'm sorry
malfoy: who doesn't
harry: a horrible decision, really
dumbledore: *laughs hysterically*
ginny: *finger guns*
sirius: i know
remus: why
fred: YEET
voldemort: if only there was someone out there who loved you

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Gamer!Tom loves playing Skyrim, Fallout, Dragon Age, etc, pretty much any game where you can play as an evil morality...
body: Prompt: Gamer!Tom loves playing Skyrim, Fallout, Dragon Age, etc, pretty much any game where you can play as an evil morality character. For ages, he has been trying to convince his friend Harry to play one of these games instead of the tacky phone games Harry prefers. Harry always politely refuses, until one day Harry takes up the controller, and soon after, Tom realises exactly why Harry avoids those sorts of games.

reblog.comment: Prompt: Gamer!Tom loves playing Skyrim, Fallout, Dragon Age, etc, pretty much any game where you can play as an evil morality character. For ages, he has been trying to convince his friend Harry to play one of these games instead of the tacky phone games Harry prefers. Harry always politely refuses, until one day Harry takes up the controller, and soon after, Tom realises exactly why Harry avoids those sorts of games.

Harry always politely refuses, until one day Harry takes up the controller, and soon after, Tom realises exactly why Harry avoids those sorts of games.

summary: After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke...
caption:
After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke took his place as President of the Magical Congress of the United States of America. He immediately proposed laws that forced No-Maj and Wizard marriages to be declared to the government, with future marriages now needing written approval by the government. His new push for laws that ban No-Maj borns from attending Illvermorny has been met with uproar by the majority of the public, and has been stalled in the Magical Congress for the last 2 years. With the marauders set to return to school, the students of Ilvermorny can only try to go on living their lives as usual.

                               ILVERMORNY . 2018

         HOME // FULL PLOT // NAVIGATION

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?

summary: Art of War Chapter 1, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
title: Art of War Chapter 1, a harry potter fanfic | FanFiction
description:
Title: Art of War
Author: TheGirlWithFarTooManyIdeas
Fandom: Harry Potter
Ships: None
Tag: General

Summary: OoTP. Harry, Ron and Hermione realize that they’re going to have to save their own lives - because no one else will. Turning to their own war plans, they create an inner circle and begin recruiting assassin, spies, ticking time bombs. A group of rag tag students will become an army. Can this give Harry the opening to defeat the Dark Lord? Inspired by Red Dawn.

summary: Lily: Look, I told you again and again, I have no interest in you and you don't have a chance. And yet you keep thinking I have...
body:
Lily: Look, I told you again and again, I have no interest in you and you don't have a chance. And yet you keep thinking I have interest in you and you have a chance. 
James: Wait! Did you just say that you're interested in me and I have a chance?

dialogue.label: Lily:
dialogue.phrase: Look, I told you again and again, I have no interest in you and you don't have a chance. And yet you keep thinking I have interest in you and you have a chance.

dialogue.name: James

dialogue.phrase: Wait! Did you just say that you're interested in me and I have a chance?

summary:
Draco: Do you find Fleur beautiful?
Harry: She's pretty, yes
Draco: But prettier than me?
Harry: None is prettier than...
body:
Draco: Do you find Fleur beautiful?
Harry: She's pretty, yes
Draco: But prettier than me?
Harry: None is prettier than you
Draco: Good answer, you passed the test

If anyone actually wants me to draw a thing just DM me.

I’m also a flautist, Musical nerd and play table tennis (before going blind was a 3 time nationalist.)
